sourcesContent:
Item Qty Price unit Sub total
{{ item.name }} {{ item.qty }} {{ item.price | currency }} {{ item.qty * item.price | currency }}

Total: {{ total$ | async | currency }}

import { ShoppingCartService } from 'src/app/shared/services/shopping-cart.service'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-details', templateUrl: './details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./details.component.scss'] }) export class DetailsComponent implements OnInit { total$ = this.shoppingCartSvc.totalAction$; cart$ = this.shoppingCartSvc.cartAction$; constructor(private shoppingCartSvc: ShoppingCartService) { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
